name: Infernal Consumption
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Obsidian flames attempt to envelop target creature within range that you can see. They must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw, taking 5d6 damage on a failure and half damage on a success. Half of the damage is fire, while the other half is unholy.

If this reduces the creature's hit points to 0 or lower, you steal one of their hit dice until you spend it or complete a rest.
empower: Pay the empower cost in hit points instead of MP. Damage increased to 6d6. Steals two hit dice if it successfully reduces a creature to 0 or fewer hit points.
